love.question: Hey {name}! Social media mein couple posts dekhte time...
love.englishHint: When you see couple posts on social media...

options.text: Ugh, show off kar rahe hain 🙄

love.question: Family introduction ke time, {name} you...
love.englishHint: When it comes to family introductions...

options.text: Wait for 2 years minimum, dar lagta hai 😅
Let them figure out, main kya karu 🤷

love.question: Valentine's Day ke liye, {name}, tumhara approach:
Agar {targetPronoun} busy hai aur reply nahi kar raha...
love.englishHint: If {targetPronoun} is busy and not replying...

options.text: One gentle follow-up after few hours 💬

love.question: First date planning mein, {name}, you prefer:
love.englishHint: For first date planning, you prefer:

options.text: Let them decide, main flexible hu 🤷

love.question: Jab {targetPronoun} ke friends tumse milte hain...

options.text: Nervous ho jata hu, awkward feel 😅

friendship.question: Jab tumhara best friend 3am mein call karta hai, {name}...
friendship.englishHint: When your best friend calls at 3am...

options.text: Phone utha leta hu, emergency hogi 📞
Silent mode mein hai, morning mein dekhunga 😴

friendship.question: Group mein plans banate time, {name}, tu kaisa hai:
friendship.englishHint: When making group plans, you are:

options.text: Main organizer, sab plan karta hu 📋
Just go with the flow, jo decide ho 🌊
Suggest ideas but let others decide 💡
Usually make excuse, ghar pe rehna hai 🏠

friendship.question: Agar friend ka breakup hua hai, {name} tu:
friendship.englishHint: If your friend had a breakup, you:

options.text: Ice cream leke immediately pahunch jata hu 🍦
Message kar deta hu 'call kar if needed' 📱
Give them space for few days 🤐
Awkward lagta hai, avoid karta hu 😬

friendship.question: Friend ka birthday bhool gaye, {name}, ab kya karna hai:

options.text: Midnight surprise plan, recover karna hai 🎂
Casual wish, act like nothing happened 😅

friendship.question: Group chat mein gossip chal rahi hai, {name}:
friendship.englishHint: Gossip happening in group chat, you:

options.text: Leave chat temporarily, drama nahi chahiye 🚪

friendship.question: Friend ne tumse paisa udhar manga, {name}, tu:
friendship.englishHint: Friend asked to borrow money, you:

options.text: Immediately de deta hu, no questions 💸
Puchta hu kya kaam hai, then decide 🤔
Amount dekh ke decide karta hu 💰
Excuse banata hu, paisa nahi deta 🙅

career.question: Office mein new project assign hua, {name}, tumhara first reaction:
career.englishHint: New project assigned at office, your first reaction:

options.text: Google karta hu kaise karna hai 🔍
Team se puchta hu who's done this before 👥

career.question: Meeting mein idea present karna hai, {name}:
career.englishHint: Have to present idea in meeting:

options.text: PowerPoint banake rehearsal kar leta hu 🎤
Main points note kar leta hu 📝
Pray karta hu ki koi aur present kare 🙏

career.question: Boss ne feedback diya for improvement, {name}:

options.text: Thank you, action plan ready karta hu 📋
Nod karta hu but internally defensive 😤
Feel attacked, mood off ho jata hai 😔
Let others apply, main qualified nahi 😟

career.question: Work-life balance ke liye, {name}, tumhara approach:

options.text: Strict boundaries, 6pm ke baad no work 🕕
Flexible, urgent kaam complete karta hu ⚖️
Work comes first, personal time adjust 💼

career.question: Colleague ne tumhara credit le liya, {name}:

options.text: Professionally address karta hu boss ke saath 💼
Let it go, karma will handle 😕
Jo mann kiya wahi karta hu 🎭

personality.question: Party mein jaana hai, {name}, tu typically:
personality.englishHint: Going to a party, you typically:

options.text: First one to arrive, help with setup 🎉
Go with someone, alone awkward lagta 👫
Make excuse last minute, ghar pe better 🏠

personality.question: New hobby try karna hai, {name}:
personality.englishHint: Want to try a new hobby:

options.text: Research kar ke best classes join 📚
Friends ke saath try karta hu 👥
Think about it but never actually start 💭
List banata hu, budget stick karta hu 📝

personality.question: Argument ho gaya kisi ke saath, {name}:

options.text: Cool down kar ke mature discussion 🤝
Apologize first, even if not my fault 😔
